Package flixnet

Class Contenido

  • java.lang.Object
    • flixnet.Contenido
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Pelicula, Serie
    public class Contenido
extends java.lang.Object
    Class: Contenido Object Contenido with different attributes such as titulo, productora, año and if the user has seen it. Stablish the core for classes Pelicula and Serie which inherit from this one.
